title: 材质
author: shuoqi_yuan
txt_content: 怎么装材质和高清补丁

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
材质放进%appdata%/.minecraft/texturepacks 里 别解压 就让.zip呆在里面
高清补丁的话 先准备干净的jar 打开高清补丁 点patch Minecraft

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
不是patchMinecraft 有个Patch按钮 直接点他就行了 



最下面的那个
